meanings.definition: Suffering from or relating to the effects of excessive eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: After the feast, he felt crapulent and regretted eating so much.
meanings.sent2: She woke up feeling crapulent after the late-night party.
meanings.sent3: The crapulent cat ate all the fish in one go and now looks very uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The garbage can was so full, it appeared crapulent and ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with a crapulent smell after the big meal.

meanings.definition: Experiencing discomfort or illness due to overindulgence in food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The crapulent man groaned as he held his stomach in pain.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the buffet as she didn't want to end up feeling crapulent again.
meanings.sent3: The crapulent puppy regretted eating the entire bag of treats.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were littered with crapulent partygoers after the festival.
meanings.sent5: The once pristine beach was now covered in crapulent trash after the picnic.
